Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 240th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2012...
Released by Chicago (A) on 5/15/2012...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 3/1/2013 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/14/2016 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Injured on 7/27/2017 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Milwaukee to Oakland on 7/31/2017 (Going to MIL: P L. Fortney. Going to OAK: RF L. Jenkins)...
Had first career hit on 6/1/2019, off Martin Agosta (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/22/2019, off Francisco Liriano (TB)...
Won World Championship with Oakland in 2023...
